panels.title: p99 read response size by route

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (le, route) (rate(flagsmith_http_server_response_size_bytes_bucket{route!="",method!~"GET|HEAD"}[$__interval]))) or vector(0)

panels.title: p99 write response size by route

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(flagsmith_http_server_request_duration_seconds_bucket{route!="",method!="GET"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, route, method)) or vector(0)
